EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series Follow Up Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending American Student Assistance's ____________ Partnership Dialog Series.
Date: Time: Location:
It was a pleasure to see so many friendly faces.
Some follow up items from our event: _________________________ __________________________ __________________________
Please contact us at training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 with any questions
Check our website for future events. http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm
We look forward to seeing you again!
